description:
O&O DiskStat is a tool for analyzing and optimizing disk space on drives and directories in Windows.

O&O DiskStat provides detailed analysis of disk space usage on drives and directories. The software clearly displays which files and folders consume the most space and helps in finding duplicates. With a user-friendly, explorer-like interface, users can identify and remove space hogs. The software supports batch processing of files and offers comprehensive export and import functions. O&O DiskStat is ideal for managing and optimizing hard drive storage.
